text: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوا۟ فَسَيَأْتِيهِمْ أَنۢبَـٰٓؤُا۟ مَا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ

translation.en.sahih: For they have already denied, but there will come to them the news of that which they used to ridicule.
translation.id.indonesian: Sungguh mereka telah mendustakan (Al Quran), maka kelak akan datang kepada mereka (kenyataan dari) berita-berita yang selalu mereka perolok-olokkan.
